ayahs.text: Al^m^r tiloka 'aAya`tu {lokita`bi wa{l~a*iY^ >unzila <ilayoka min r~ab~ika {loHaq~u wala`kin~a >akovara {ln~aAsi laA yu&ominuwna

{ll~ahu {l~a*iY rafaEa {ls~ama`wa`ti bigayori EamadK tarawonahaA vum~a {sotawaY` EalaY {loEaro$i wasax~ara {l$~amosa wa{loqamara kul~N yajoriY li>ajalK m~usam~FY yudab~iru {lo>amora yufaS~ilu {lo'aAya`ti laEal~akum biliqaA^'i rab~ikumo tuwqinuwna

wahuwa {l~a*iY mad~a {lo>aroDa wajaEala fiyhaA rawa`siYa wa>anoha`rFA wamin kul~i {lv~amara`ti jaEala fiyhaA zawojayoni {vonayoni yugo$iY {l~ayola {ln~ahaAra <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yatafak~aruwna

wafiY {lo>aroDi qiTaEN m~utaja`wira`tN wajan~a`tN m~ino >aEona`bK wazaroEN wanaxiylN SinowaAnN wagayoru SinowaAnK yusoqaY` bimaA^'K wa`HidK wanufaD~ilu baEoDahaA EalaY` baEoDK fiY {lo>ukuli <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAya`tK l~iqawomK yaEoqiluwna

wa<in taEojabo faEajabN qawoluhumo >a'i*aA kun~aA tura`bFA >a'in~aA lafiY xaloqK jadiydK >uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ birab~ihimo wa>uw@la`^}ika {lo>agola`lu fiY^ >aEonaAqihimo wa>uw@la`^}ika >aSoHa`bu {ln~aAri humo fiyhaA xa`liduwna

sawaA^'N m~inkum m~ano >asar~a {loqawola waman jahara bihi. wamano huwa musotaxofK] bi{l~ayoli wasaAribN[ bi{ln~ahaAri

lahu, muEaq~iba`tN m~in[ bayoni yadayohi wamino xalofihi. yaHofaZuwnahu, mino >amori {ll~ahi <in~a {ll~aha laA yugay~iru maA biqawomK Hat~aY` yugay~iruwA@ maA bi>anfusihimo wa<i*aA^ >araAda {ll~ahu biqawomK suw^'FA falaA marad~a lahu, wamaA lahum m~in duwnihi. min waAlK
huwa {l~a*iY yuriykumu {lobaroqa xawofFA waTamaEFA wayun$i}u {ls~aHaAba {lv~iqaAla
wayusab~iHu {lr~aEodu biHamodihi. wa{lomala`^}ikapu mino xiyfatihi. wayurosilu {lS~awa`Eiqa fayuSiybu bihaA man ya$aA^'u wahumo yuja`diluwna fiY {ll~ahi wahuwa $adiydu {lomiHaAli

lahu, daEowapu {loHaq~i wa{l~a*iyna yadoEuwna min duwnihi. laA yasotajiybuwna lahum bi$aYo'K <il~aA kaba`siTi kaf~ayohi <ilaY {lomaA^'i liyaboluga faAhu wamaA huwa biba`ligihi. wamaA duEaA^'u {loka`firiyna <il~aA fiY Dala`lK
walil~ahi yasojudu man fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi TawoEFA wakarohFA waZila`luhum bi{loguduw~i wa{lo'aASaAli

qulo man r~ab~u {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi quli {ll~ahu qulo >afa{t~axa*otum m~in duwnihi.^ >awoliyaA^'a laA yamolikuwna li>anfusihimo nafoEFA walaA Dar~FA qulo halo yasotawiY {lo>aEomaY` wa{lobaSiyru >amo halo tasotawiY {lZ~uluma`tu wa{ln~uwru >amo jaEaluwA@ lil~ahi $urakaA^'a xalaquwA@ kaxaloqihi. fata$a`baha {loxaloqu Ealayohimo quli {ll~ahu xa`liqu kul~i $aYo'K wahuwa {lowa`Hidu {loqah~a`ru

>anzala mina {ls~amaA^'i maA^'F fasaAlato >awodiyapN[ biqadarihaA fa{Hotamala {ls~ayolu zabadFA r~aAbiyFA wamim~aA yuwqiduwna Ealayohi fiY {ln~aAri {botigaA^'a HiloyapK >awo mata`EK zabadN m~ivoluhu, ka*a`lika yaDoribu {ll~ahu {loHaq~a wa{loba`Tila fa>am~aA {lz~abadu faya*ohabu jufaA^'F wa>am~aA maA yanfaEu {ln~aAsa fayamokuvu fiY {lo>aroDi ka*a`lika yaDoribu {ll~ahu {lo>amovaAla

lil~a*iyna {sotajaAbuwA@ lirab~ihimu {loHusonaY` wa{l~a*iyna lamo yasotajiybuwA@ lahu, lawo >an~a lahum m~aA fiY {lo>aroDi jamiyEFA wamivolahu, maEahu, la{fotadawoA@ bihi.^ >uw@la`^}ika lahumo suw^'u {loHisaAbi wama>owaY`humo jahan~amu wabi}osa {lomihaAdu

wa{l~a*iyna yanquDuwna Eahoda {ll~ahi min[ baEodi miyva`qihi. wayaqoTaEuwna maA^ >amara {ll~ahu bihi.^ >an yuwSala wayufosiduwna fiY {lo>aroDi >uw@la`^}ika lahumu {ll~aEonapu walahumo suw^'u {ld~aAri

wayaquwlu {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ lawolaA^ >unzila Ealayohi 'aAyapN m~in r~ab~ihi. qulo <in~a {ll~aha yuDil~u man ya$aA^'u wayahodiY^ <ilayohi mano >anaAba
{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ wataToma}in~u quluwbuhum bi*ikori {ll~ahi >alaA bi*ikori {ll~ahi taToma}in~u {loquluwbu

ka*a`lika >arosalona`ka fiY^ >um~apK qado xalato min qabolihaA^ >umamN l~itatoluwaA@ Ealayohimu {l~a*iY^ >awoHayonaA^ <ilayoka wahumo yakofuruwna bi{lr~aHoma`ni qulo huwa rab~iY laA^ <ila`ha <il~aA huwa Ealayohi tawak~alotu wa<ilayohi mataAbi

walawo >an~a quro'aAnFA suy~irato bihi {lojibaAlu >awo quT~iEato bihi {lo>aroDu >awo kul~ima bihi {lomawotaY` bal l~il~ahi {lo>amoru jamiyEFA >afalamo yaA@yo_#asi {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ >an l~awo ya$aA^'u {ll~ahu lahadaY {ln~aAsa jamiyEFA walaA yazaAlu {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ tuSiybuhum bimaA SanaEuwA@ qaAriEapN >awo taHul~u qariybFA m~in daArihimo Hat~aY` ya>otiYa waEodu {ll~ahi <in~a {ll~aha laA yuxolifu {lomiyEaAda

>afamano huwa qaA^}imN EalaY` kul~i nafosK] bimaA kasabato wajaEaluwA@ lil~ahi $urakaA^'a qulo sam~uwhumo >amo tunab~i_#uwnahu, bimaA laA yaEolamu fiY {lo>aroDi >am biZa`hirK m~ina {loqawoli balo zuy~ina lil~a*iyna kafaruwA@ makoruhumo waSud~uwA@ Eani {ls~abiyli waman yuDolili {ll~ahu famaA lahu, mino haAdK
